SELECT HOUR ( FROM_UNIXTIME( m.create_time_stamp / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) hours, count( m.id ) messageCount FROM message m inner join `session` s on s.id = m.session_id and s.sys_id = #{systemId} WHERE DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME( m.create_time_stamp / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) = #{days} GROUP BY HOUR ( FROM_UNIXTIME( m.create_time_stamp / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) )

SELECT ( FROM_UNIXTIME( m.create_time_stamp / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) days, count( m.id ) messageCount FROM message m INNER JOIN `session` s ON s.id = m.session_id AND s.sys_id = #{systemId} WHERE m.create_time_stamp >= #{start} AND m.create_time_stamp <= #{end} GROUP BY ( FROM_UNIXTIME( m.create_time_stamp / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) )
